title: [FSX/P3D] ORBX - FTX NA KTVL Lake Tahoe
description:
NA KTVL Lake Tahoe

The culmination of many months of development, KTVL Lake Tahoe is OrbxÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s third airport for FTX Northern California. This package not only includes an impeccably detailed rendition of KTVL, but over 500 square km of beautifully detailed surrounding area to explore. Immerse yourself as you fly amongst the alpine lakes and bush of the Sierra Nevada, enjoy the stunning vistas of the mountain ranges on both sides of the airport as you approach from the lake, and when you're done, shut down your engines and have a bite to eat at the flight deck at KTVL, or alternatively, hire a bike from Mountain West aviation at the FBO and ride down to South Lake Tahoe or Stateline to enjoy the bustling high life with fine restaurants, casinos and lakeside beaches! You can also pop in during the long winter season (November-March) and hit the slopes of Heavenly mountain (we have operational ski lifts!), or chuck your skis onto your favourite bush aircraft and head to the Sierras and land on one of the hundreds of frozen over lakes. Another gem from Misha Cajic!

    500sq km of pristine photoreal imagery!
    Stunning mountain location
    Fully custom modeled airport and objects
    Advanced rendering and AO techniques
    Animated ski-lifts during the winter!
    All new custom vegetation exclusive to KTVL
    Includes SnowFlow, freezing rivers and lakes
    Designed for FTX NA NorCal
    Available for P3Dv2 and FSX/P3Dv1.4
    Optimized for the NGX and airlines
    Developed by Misha Cajic

This is an Orbx FTX airport, and as such a copy of FTX: NA Gold USA Northern California must be installed prior to use.
